<h2>Skills & Resume</h2>
  
```{r, out.width='100%', fig.align='center', message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(plotly)



my_stamp <- stamp("Jun-2020", orders = "by")

journey <- fread("C:/Users/laryl/Desktop/Data Sets/data_journey.csv")   %>%
  mutate(Concept = dplyr::recode(Concept, 
                                "JavaScript" = "D3.js and JavaScript",
                                "D3.js" = "D3.js and JavaScript" ))%>%
  mutate(Date_formatted = my_stamp(Date))


journey_counted <- journey %>%
  count(Date, Date_formatted, Concept, Topics)



journey_counted$Concept <- factor(journey_counted$Concept, levels = c( "Tableau", "D3.js and JavaScript",  "HTML and CSS","Google Sheets/Excel" , "SQL", "Python", "R"))

p2<- ggplot(journey_counted, aes(x= Date , y=Concept, color= Concept, text = Date_formatted )) + 
  geom_jitter(aes(group= Topics), alpha= 0.5)+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#0f7d6b", "#FAF8A8", "#40CBEC", "#46D69F","#B9ACEA",  "#FFCD2D","#B9D4ED"  ))+
  scale_x_date(date_labels="%b-%Y", date_breaks = "2 months") +
  labs(
       title = "Topics Covered During Data Science Journey")+
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
        plot.subtitle = element_text( color = "darkslategrey", margin = margin(b =10), hjust = 0.5), 
        legend.position = "none",
        text = element_text(family = "Libre Baskerville"), axis.title.y = element_blank(), axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 6))

ggplotly(p2, tooltip = c("text", "Topics" )) %>%
  layout(
    annotations = list(x = 0.95, y = -0.08, text = "Source: Courtesy of My Browsing History", 
      showarrow = F, xref='paper', yref='paper', 
      xanchor='right', yanchor='auto', xshift=0, yshift=0,
      font=list(size= 6.5, color="darkslategrey")))
  

```
